overview:
Frank P. Elsenbast joined LodgeNet Interactive Corporation (NASD:LNET) as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer in April 2010.

As CFO, Mr. Elsenbast oversees the companyâ€™s finance operation with responsibility for all of the companyâ€™s financial reporting and budgeting, treasury operations, balance sheet management, procurement, investor relations, information technology, audit, tax, and acquisition programs. Mr. Elsenbast brings more than two decades of corporate finance, media industry background and public accounting experience to his responsibilities within LodgeNet.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
